name: Island enhanced weaps
description:
When you wake up again, you find yourself on a beach. Why are you here? How to survive? How to leave and return to normal life? What code is hidden around here? But what you need to do now is look around and look for weapons. Come on, the fight is coming!



This is a survival class shooting game, the pursuit of interest and combat is a highly profound psychological combat.



The perfect combination of various modes brings you unique and charming game experience. Players play the role of fighting monsters on the beach alone. You can experience killing monsters and finding materials on the beach. Players should carefully collect the surrounding weapons and ammunition and kill the enemies you encounter with bullets. Try to live! Take up the weapon and kill the zombie!



Operation mode



Right click the target

WASD controls motion

Left mouse button attack

Mouse control direction
